019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config;
020
021import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
022import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.CLASS;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025
026import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
027import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
028import java.lang.annotation.Target;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.NullStringConverter;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
034
035/**
036 *  <p>{@summary This annotation indicates that the property for the annotated
037 *  getter is initialised from a system property with the given name.}</p>
038 *  <p>The initialisation uses the default
039 *  {@link StringConverter}
040 *  for the type of the property if none is provided; if there is no default
041 *  String converter, an error is thrown during compile time.</p>
042 *  <p>Changing the configuration property value will not have an effect to
043 *  the system property.</p>
044 *  <p>This annotation implies the
045 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.NoPreference}
046 *  annotation.</p>
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: SystemProperty.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.0.1
051 *
052 *  @see System#getProperty(String)
053 */
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SystemProperty.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $" )
055@Documented
056@Retention( CLASS )
057@Target( METHOD )
058@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
059public @interface SystemProperty
060{
061        /*------------*\
062    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
063        \*------------*/
064    /**
065     *  <p>{@summary The default value for the system property.} It will
066     *  be used for the initialisation of the property if the system property
067     *  is not set.</p>
068     *  <p>It is mandatory to provide a default value for primitive type
069     *  properties.</p>
070     *  <p>The default setting is a String containing only a {@code NUL}; it
071     *  will be treated as _null</p>
072     *
073     *  @return The default value.
074     */
075    public String defaultValue() default "\0";
076
077    /**
078     *  The name for the system property to read.
079     *
080     *  @return The name for the system property.
081     */
082    String value();
083
084    /**
085     *  <p>{@summary The implementation of
086     *  {@link StringConverter}
087     *  that is used to translate the value of the system property.}</p>
088     *  <p>This should be set only for implementations of
089     *  {@code StringConverter} that cannot be retrieved through
090     *  {@link StringConverter#forClass(Class)}
091     *  with the class/type of the annotated property as argument.</p>
092     *  <p>It is also important that the return type of the <i>provided</i>
093     *  implementation of
094     *  {@link StringConverter#fromString(CharSequence)}
095     *  is <i>exactly</i> the same as the type of the property; this is usually
096     *  not the case if this implementation is derived from a base class and
097     *  does not override {@code fromString()} itself. Otherwise the code
098     *  generation process may throw an exception.</p>
099     *  <p>The default value is
100     *  {@link NullStringConverter},
101     *  a placeholder implementation indicating that the string converter
102     *  should be derived from the property type.</p>
103     *
104     *  @note   The code generation process does not regard a potentially
105     *      existing {@code getSubjectClass()} method on the string converter
106     *      implementation.
107     *
108     *  @return The class for the String converter.
109     *
110     *  @deprecated Use the annotation
111     *      {@link StringConversion &#64;StringConversion}
112     *      instead.
113     */
114    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
115    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.2" )
116    Class<? extends StringConverter<?>> stringConverter() default NullStringConverter.class;
117}
118//  annotation SystemProperty
119
120/*
121 *  End of File
122 */
